wikitext.*:
'''''rië''''' or ('''''ríe''''') is [[Quenya]] for "crown, garland".<ref name=PE>{{PE|17}}, p. 182 ("''rië'' garland")</ref><ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 383 ("''rie'' crown")</ref><ref name=VT/>

==Etymology==
In the manuscript "Eldarin Roots and Stem", Quenya ''rië'' derives from [[Sundocarme|root]] [[RIG]].<ref name=PE/> In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']], Quenya ''ríe'' is a descendant form of [[Primitive Quendian]] ''rīgē'', deriving from root RIG.<ref name=LR/><ref name=VT>{{VT|46a}}, p. 11</ref>

*[[Quenya]]/[[Telerin]] ''[[ría]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[rî]]''
*[[Noldorin]] ''[[rhî]]''
